Package io.sbk.logger

Interface RWLogger

All Superinterfaces:
CountReaders, CountRW, CountWriters, Logger, io.perl.logger.PerformanceLogger, io.perl.logger.Print, io.perl.api.ReportLatency
All Known Implementing Classes:
CSVLogger, GrpcPrometheusLogger, PrometheusLogger, Sl4jResultLogger, SystemLogger
public interface RWLogger extends Logger, CountRW, io.perl.api.ReportLatency
Interface for recoding/printing results.
